entry.title: Scott® Essential Standard Bathroom Tissue (80 x 506)
entry.summary:
Vendor: KIMBERLY-CLARK
Type: bathroom tissue
Price: 58.41

Scott® Essential provides reliable balance of efficiency, performance and value. As a business owner, quality and cost-effectiveness are important in everything you purchase. With Scott® Essential 100% Recycled Fiber Standard Roll Toilet Paper bulk toilet paper, you can get the quality and performance you count on—and still stay within your budget. Superior quality at value prices means that Scott® Essential is always a great choice. If practicality and value are your top criteria for washroom products, you can trust the Scott® Essential brand to deliver.

  • 80 rolls / case, 506 sheets / roll
  • White toilet tissue is neutral and goes in any restroom
  • Made with 100% recycled fiber, this 2-ply bulk toilet paper is strong and absorbent
  • Scotts biodegradable toilet paper meets EPA minimum standards, and it’s FSC and EcoLogo certified, so that you can feel confident about choosing a wholesale eco-friendly product at a great price
  • Meets EPA minimum standards (including 100% recycled fiber content) and is FSC and Eco Logo certified

Colour White
Strength 2-Ply
Unit Size 4.1" x 4.0"
Core Diameter 1.5
Units per Case  80
Brand Scott
Manufacture Code 13217

entry.title: Pro Select™ Toilet Paper (80 x 550)
entry.summary:
Vendor: CASCADES
Type: bathroom tissue
Price: 57.47

Cascades PRO Select™ standard toilet paper is an economical and reliable choice for restrooms in office schools, retail locations and foodservice venues. Delivering 550 sheets of individually wrapped 2-ply toilet paper, each soft and absorbent roll provides quality and comfort. Green Seal certified and made with 100% recycled fiber, this eco-responsible product will increase customer satisfaction. This product is biodegradable and safe for plumbing and septic systems. This product meets the Green Seal™ Standard GS-1, based on chlorine-free processing, energy and water efficiency, and content of 100% recovered material with a minimum of 50% post-consumer material.

Colour  White
Core 1.625
Dimensions 4.25 x 3.75 in
Strength 2-Ply
Weight 29.2lbs
Sheets/roll 550
Rolls/case 80
Manufacture Cascades
Brand PRO Select
Manufacture Code B200
